backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing authorization, user profiles, order CRUD, and sensitive file storage with access control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping issues and enhancements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON listing short summaries for all frontend files, describing UI behavior, error handling, and infrastructure details.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend CSS.
frontend/index.html: Arabic RTL HTML entry point loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app shell with authentication, profile setup, tab navigation, and an error boundary to prevent blank screens.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginGate.t: Gate component that blocks access until the user logs in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for entering and saving the user's display name with defensive modal cleanup.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Remind: Reminder popup showing order details and performing defensive cleanup on close.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorB: React error boundary that catches render errors, logs details, and shows a reload screen with cleanup handling.
frontend/src/features/orders/OrderTracki: UI for managing orders with create, edit, delete, reminders, and notification permission handling.
frontend/src/features/orders/useReminder: Hook that checks orders for due reminders, triggers notifications, and tracks dismissed reminders via localStorage.
frontend/src/features/pdf/pdfjsConfig.ts: Loads PDF.js from a CDN at runtime and exposes configured PDF.js APIs for PDF processing.
frontend/src/features/pdf/pdfScan.ts: Utility that scans PDF text for sensitive words using PDF.js, reporting matches and progress.
frontend/src/features/pdf/PdfUploadSecti: PDF upload and scanning UI handling progress, errors, and sensitive word detection using backend APIs.
frontend/src/features/sensitiveWords/Sen: Interface to add, edit, delete, and view sensitive words with masking and modal dialogs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing related queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, sensitive file uploads, sensitive word management, and order operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode, and RTL-friendly typography and layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/utils/modalCleanup.ts: Restores document and body styles to fix leftover modal side effects like locked scrolling or hidden content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters, including support for hash-based routing and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, containers, animations, and integrates plugins like typography and container queries.
